title: Wiki-Based Science Group Work and Assessment Competency Development Course (Large-Scale)

context.prior_knowledge: Core knowledge of science subjects and digital device utilization skills
context.additional_context: Students systematically acquire wiki-based collaborative learning and assessment methods through an LMS, gaining experience applying these to real science projects through action research and blended learning

learning_goals: Learners collaboratively draft a science inquiry report by Week 5 using a wiki platform.
Design and apply three evaluation criteria for wiki tool utilization in a blended learning environment within three months.
Apply action research methodology to resolve at least two issues encountered during group work by the end of a six-month course.
Perform and incorporate peer feedback five or more times via online discussion forums and wiki records.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
